definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: A high stiff collar framed his narrow face.
sentences.chinese: 高高的硬領襯着他的窄臉。

sentences.english: He wore a celluloid collar and lace up boots.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿賽璐珞硬領，足登繫帶長靴。

sentences.english: Chris was looking spruce in his stiff-collared black shirt and new short hair cut.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯穿着硬領黑衫，新理了短髮，看起來整潔帥氣。
